name: Insecticide (itch) (SaltFactory Studio)
description:
Do you have a hatred for ants and beetle? Say no more. Pick up the weapons and start shooting. 

Test your survival in the forest. Level Up as you complete each waves and gain upgrade such as increased damage and fire rate.

Control:

  • W-A-S-D : Movement
  • Space : Jump
  • Left Mouse Click : Fire
  • Right Mouse Click : Zoom / Focus
  • Shift : Sprint
